short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple and modern random password generator.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the Random Password Generator - a sleek, user-friendly Chrome extension designed to create strong, unique passwords while offering an enjoyable user experience. With our modern interface, generating and managing passwords has never been easier or more visually appealing.

✅ Key Features:
• Quick copy: As soon as you click the extension icon, a password will be copied.
• Customizable Password Generation: Choose your preferred password length and enable or disable symbols to generate the perfect password for your needs.
• Local & Secure: All passwords are generated locally on your device, ensuring your data remains secure and private.
• Paired History: Each generated password is paired with its corresponding URL and stored locally, making it simple to keep track of your password usage.
• Easy History Management: Effortlessly view, update, or delete your password history within the extension.

✏️ Planned Features:
• Advanced Settings: In the future, I plan to introduce an advanced settings page, allowing you to change the language, customize allowed special characters, and more.
• Password Creation Dates: I will be adding a feature to store the dates of when passwords were created in the password history.
• Open to Suggestions: Your feedback is important to me! I always welcome suggestions and ideas for improving the extension.

If you have any questions, suggestions, or feedback, please feel free to reach out to me at ethanmcrae0@gmail.com. I'd be happy to hear from you!
